alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 20 at 9:31PM CDT until August 20 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Blount, Jefferson and Walker. * WHEN...Until 1245 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 931 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sumiton, Cordova, Dora, Adamsville, Warrior, Kimberly, Graysville, Morris, Trafford, Hayden, Sipsey, Nectar, West Jefferson, County Line, Arkadelphia, Rocky Hollow, Burnwell, Blount Springs, Quinton and Beloit.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
